import React from 'react'; import { Search, Plus, Edit, Trash2, Users, Calendar, CreditCard, User, CalendarDays, ArrowLeft, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; const CustomerForm = ({ customer, onSave, onCancel, title }) => (

{title}

customer === newCustomer ? setNewCustomer({...newCustomer, fullName: e.target.value}) : setEditingCustomer({...editingCustomer, fullName: e.target.value}) } />
customer === newCustomer ? setNewCustomer({...newCustomer, phoneNumber: e.target.value}) : setEditingCustomer({...editingCustomer, phoneNumber: e.target.value}) } />
